title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: When using the Java perspective, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled.
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled in the Java perspective.
EB: The "Build" action should only be enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective when there are buildable artifacts in the current project.
SR: Update the code to correctly enable the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu only when there are buildable artifacts in the current project while using the Java perspective.
